import axios from'axios';import Cookies from'js-cookie';const axiosInstance=axios.create({baseURL:'http://127.0.0.1:8000/',// Adjust this base URL if necessary
headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Accept':'application/json'}});axiosInstance.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=Cookies.get('csrftoken');if(token){const cong=config.headers['X-CSRFToken']=token;console.log(cong);}return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});export default axiosInstance;
